label: Health center
codebookDescription: Clinics where women attending their prenatal care visit. 26 clinics were randomized and participated in the trial. The 26 clinics are included on the data release. New clinics IDs were constructed for the data release. Each clinic was assigned a random number. The clusters were rank ordered according to the random number and assigned a new identification number based on their rank. The new ID consists of a 2-digit number.

label: Country
codebookDescription: Country where the clinic located

label: Cluster study arm
codebookDescription: Allocation to which the clinic was randomized

label: Health center type
definition: Type of antenatal care clinic
codebookDescription: Site (hospital) where women attending their prenatal care visit. If Clinic belong to the public system, then TypeClinic=1, If Clinic belong to the private system, then TypeClinic=2, If Clinic is faith based then, TypeClinic =3

label: Syphilis/HIV program at health center
codebookDescription: Site (hospital) where women attending their prenatal care visit has a Syphilis/HIV program. If Clinic had Syphilis/HIV program, then Program =1. Otherwise, if it did not have any Syphilis/HIV program then Program =2.

label: First ANC visits count
definition: Number of first antenatal care (ANC) visits performed during the study period at the clinic
codebookDescription: Number of first prenatal care visits performed during the study period.

label: First ANC visits per provider count
definition: Number of first antenatal care (ANC) visits performed during the study period divided by the number of health providers who were qualified to perform rapid tests and administer injections (nurses, doctors, midwives) at the clinic
codebookDescription: Number of first prenatal care visits performed during the study period divided by the number of health providers who were qualified to perform rapid tests and administer injections (nurses, doctors, midwives)

label: Data collection period
codebookDescription: Data collection of baseline period (month-day-year) categorized as study_period =1. Zambia: from 04-13-2015 to 01-10-2016 and DRC:  from 04-01-2015  to 01-13-2016. Data collection of intervention period (year/month/day) categorized as  study_period =2. Zambia: 02-08-2016 to  07-14-2017 and DRC: 02-01-2016 to 07-14 -2017

label: Observation month and year
codebookDescription: Month and year in which the study was conducted.

label: 'Age at enrollment
codebookDescription: Continuous measure of maternal age at the time of enrollment (years)

label: Age group at enrollment
codebookDescription: Continuous measure of maternal age at the time of enrollment categorized as less than 20 (SYPH02_AgeCat=1), 20-34 (SYPH02_AgeCat=2), 35 or greater than 35 (SYPH02_AgeCat=3).
codebookValues: 1. Less than 20; 2. Between 20 and 34; 3. 35 or more

label: Education level
codebookDescription: If maternal education is no formal schooling illiterate then SYPH02_04_E2_C2=1. Otherwise if maternal education is no formal schooling literate then SYPH02_04_E2_C2=2. Otherwise if maternal education is primary incomplete then SYPH02_04_E2_C2=3. Otherwise if maternal education is primary complete then SYPH02_04_E2_C2=4. Otherwise if maternal education is secondary incomplete then SYPH02_04_E2_C2=5. Otherwise if maternal education is secondary complete then SYPH02_04_E2_C2=6. Otherwise if maternal education is university/college incomplete then SYPH02_04_E2_C2=7. Otherwise if maternal education is university/college complete then SYPH02_04_E2_C2=8. Otherwise if maternal education is Unknown/NA then SYPH02_04_E2_C2=9.
codebookValues: 1: No formal schooling <U+2013> illiterate; 2: No formal schooling, literate; 3: Primary incomplete; 4: Primary complete; 5: Secondary incomplete; 6: Secondary complete; 7: University/college incomplete; 8: University/college complete; 9: Unknown/NA

label: Education level categorization
codebookDescription: If maternal education is no formal schooling (illiterate or literate) then SYPH02_EduCat=1.  Otherwise if maternal education is primary (complete or some Secondary) then SYPH02_EduCat=2. Otherwise if maternal education is secondary (completed) or more then SYPH02_EduCat=3.
codebookValues: 1: Incomplete primary school or less; 2: Primary school complete or Secondary incomplete; 3: Secondary complete or more

label: 'Marital status
codebookDescription: If marital status of the woman is Married/partner, then SYPH02_05_E2_C2=1. Otherwise if marital status of the woman is Single, then SYPH02_05_E2_C2 =2. Otherwise if marital status of the woman is Widowed without partner currently, then SYPH02_05_E2_C2=3. Otherwise if marital status of the woman is Divorced/separated, then SYPH02_05_E2_C2=4. Otherwise if marital status of the woman is Unknown/NA, then SYPH02_05_E2_C2=5
codebookValues: 1: Married/partner;  2: Single; 3: Widowed without partner currently;  4: Divorced/separated;  5: Unknown/NA

label: Marital status categorized
codebookDescription: If marital status of the woman is Married/partner, then SYPH02_MarStatCat=1. Otherwise if marital status of the woman is Single, widowed, or divorced then SYPH02_MarStatCat=2.

label: Previous pregnancies count
definition: Number of previous pregnancies (excluding this pregnancy)
codebookDescription: Number of previous pregnancies (excluding this pregnancy)

label: Previous pregnancies count categorization
codebookDescription: If parity, excluding this pregnancy is 0 then SYPH02_PrevPreg=1.  Otherwise if the woman<U+2019>s parity is 1 to three then SYPH02_PrevPreg=2.  Otherwise if the parity is 3 or more then SYPH02_PrevPreg=3
codebookValues: 1: None; 2. One to three; 3. Three or more

label: Spontaneous abortions and stillbirths count
definition: Number of previous pregnancies which resulted in miscarriage or stillbirth
codebookDescription: Number of previous pregnancy/es which resulted in miscarriage or stillbirth

label: Spontaneous abortions and stillbirths count categorization
codebookDescription: If the woman had a pregnancy/ies which resulted in a live birth then SYPH02_PrevAbor =1.  Otherwise, if woman had  at leaste pregnancy which resulted in miscarriage or stillbirth then SYPH02_PrevAbor=2

label: 'Preterm births count
definition: Number of previous preterm births (defined as fewer than 37 weeks of gestation)
codebookDescription: Number of previous preterm birth (defined as fewer than 37 weeks of gestation)

label: Preterm births count categorization
codebookDescription: If woman did not have a live birth which resulted in a preterm birth defined as fewer than 37 weeks of gestation, then SYPH02_PrevPret=1. Otherwise, if woman had a pregnancy/ies which resulted in a preterm birth defined as fewer than 37 weeks of gestation, then SYPH02_PrevPret=2

label: Low birth weight at live births count
definition: Number of previous live births which resulted in a low birth weight (defined as 2500 g or less)
codebookDescription: Number of previous live birth/s which resulted in a low birth weight (defined as 2500 g or less) .

label: Low birth weight at live births count categorization
codebookDescription: If woman did not have a live birth which resulted in a low birth weight (defined as 2500 g or less), then SYPH02_PrevLB=1. Otherwise, if woman had a live birth/s which resulted  in a low birth weight (defined as 2500 g or less), then SYPH02_PrevLB=2

label: Congenital anomalies at live births count
definition: Number of previous live births with congenital anomalies
codebookDescription: Number of previous live birth/s with congenital anomalies

label: Congenital anomalies at live births count categorization
codebookDescription: If woman did not have a previous live birth/s with congenital anomalies then, SYPH02_PrevCong=1, If woman had a previous live birth/s with congenital anomalies then, SYPH02_PrevCong=2

label: 'Gestational age
definition: Best estimated gestational age in weeks at the time of first visit
codebookDescription: Best estimated gestational age at the time of first visit (weeks)

label: Gestational age categorization
codebookDescription: If best estimated gestational age at the time of first visit (weeks) is Equal or less than 20, then SYPH02_GestAge=1, otherwise If best estimated gestational age at the time of first visit (weeks) is 20 or more, then SYPH02_GestAge=2
codebookValues: 1: Equal or less than 20; 2. 20 or more

label: Syphilis
definition: Whether the participant had a previous syphilis infection
codebookDescription: If woman had a previous syphilis infection, then SYPH02_15_E2_C2=1. Otherwise, if woman did not have a previous syphilis infection, then SYPH02_15_E2_C2=2. Otherwise, if woman did not know if she have had a previous syphilis infection then SYPH02_15_E2_C2=3

label: Syphilis test performed
definition: Whether the participant was screened for syphilis during the first prenatal visit
codebookDescription: If woman was screened for syphilis during the first prenatal visit, then SYPH02_22_E2_C2=1. Otherwise, if woman was not screened for syphilis during the first prenatal visit, then SYPH02_22_E2_C2=2. Otherwise, if the syphilis screening status at the first prenatal visit is unknown then SYPH02_22_E2_C2=3.

label: Treponema pallidum, by rapid test
definition: In Kinshasa, Alere Determine Syphilis TP tests were used, which are point-of-care rapid syphilis tests. In Lusaka, SD Bioline Syphilis 3.0 tests were used, which are rapid immunochromatographic tests. Both tests identify the presence of antibodies to Treponema pallidum
codebookDescription: If woman was positive for syphilis during the first prenatal visit, then SYPH02_24_E2_C2=1. Otherwise, if woman was not positive during the first prenatal visit , then SYPH02_24_E2_C2=2. Otherwise, if woman syphilis status (positive/negative) is unknown during the first prenatal visit then SYPH02_24_E2_C2=3.

label: Syphilis treatment
definition: What treatment, if any, was given and when to a participant who was positive for syphilis

label: Syphilis treatment at 1st visit
definition: What treatment, if any, was given at the first prenatal visit to a participant who was positive for syphilis
codebookDescription: If woman was positive for syphilis and received BENZATHINE PENICILLIN G 2.4 MILLION UNITS INTRAMUSCULARLY at the first visit, then  SYPH02_26_E2=1, If woman was positive for syphilis and received any treatment at the first visit (other different from benzathine penicillin G 2.4 million units,  then SYPH02_26_E2=2, If woman was positive for syphilis and did not receive any treatment at the first visit,  then SYPH02_26_E2=3, If woman was positive for syphilis and it was unknown if she  receive any treatment at the first visit,  then SYPH02_26_E2=4
codebookValues: 1: Yes, Benzathine penicillin G 2.4 million units intramuscularly 2: Yes, Other, specify; 3: No; 4: Unknown

label: Vital and pregnancy status
definition: Status at follow-up visit
codebookDescription: If woman was alive, not pregnant (miscarriage, abortion) then SYPH03_01_E3_C3=1, If woman was alive, pregnant then SYPH03_01_E3_C3=2, If woman was alive, delivered then SYPH03_01_E3_C3=3, If woman died before delivery, then SYPH03_01_E3_C3=4, If woman died after delivery, then SYPH03_01_E3_C3=5, If unknown (unable to locate), then SYPH03_01_E3_C3=6
codebookValues: 1: ALIVE, NOT PREGNANT; 2: ALIVE, PREGNANT; 3: ALIVE,DELIVERED; 4: DIED BEFORE DELIVER; 5: DIED AFTER DEIVER; 6: UNKNOWN

label: Syphilis treatment between 1st and follow-up visit
definition: What treatment, if any, was given between the first prenatal visit and follow-up visit to a participant who was positive for syphilis
codebookDescription: If woman was positive for syphilis and received BENZATHINE PENICILLIN G 2.4 MILLION UNITS INTRAMUSCULARLY, between the screening and the follow up visit then SYPH03_03_E3_C3 =1, If woman was positive for syphilis and received any treatment (other different from benzathine penicillin G 2.4 million units,  between the screening and the follow up visit then SYPH03_03_E3_C3 =2, If woman was positive for syphilis and did not receive any treatment, between the screening and the follow up visit then SYPH03_03_E3_C3 =3, If woman was positive for syphilis and it was unknown if she  receive any treatment between the screening and the follow up visit then SYPH03_03_E3_C3 =4
codebookValues: 1: Yes, Benzathine penicillin G 2.4 million units intramuscularly 2: Yes, Other, specify; 3: No; 4: Unknown

label: Syphilis treatment at follow-up visit
definition: What treatment, if any, was given at the follow-up visit to a participant who was positive for syphilis
codebookDescription: If woman was positive for syphilis and received BENZATHINE PENICILLIN G 2.4 MILLION UNITS INTRAMUSCULARLY, at the follow up visit then, SYPH03_06_E3_C3=1, If woman was positive for syphilis and received any treatment (other different from benzathine penicillin G 2.4 million units) at  the follow up visit then I SYPH03_06_E3_C3=2, f woman was positive for syphilis and did not receive any treatment, at the follow up visit then SYPH03_06_E3_C3=3, If woman was positive for syphilis and it was unknown if she  receive any treatment at the follow up visit then SYPH03_06_E3_C3=4
codebookValues: 1: Yes, Benzathine penicillin G 2.4 million units intramuscularly 2: Yes, Other, specify; 3: No; 4: Unknown

label: Syphilis treated after 1st visit
definition: Participant was treated for syphilis after the first visit
codebookDescription: If woman was positive for syphilis and received treatment after the first visit (between the screening and the follow up visit , or/and  at the follow up visit), then SYPHILIS_TREATEDAFTER =1, If woman was positive for syphilis and did not received treatment after the first visit (between the screening and the follow up visit , or   at the follow up visit), then SYPHILIS_TREATEDAFTER=2

label: 'Hemoglobin measurement performed
definition: Whether the participant was screened for anemia during the first prenatal visit
codebookDescription: If  woman was screened for anemia at the first visit then, SYPH02_28_E2_C2=1, If  woman was not screened for anemia at the first visit then, SYPH02_28_E2_C2=2, If  was unknown if woman was screened for anemia at the first visit then, SYPH02_28_E2_C2=3

label: Proteinuria measurement performed
definition: Whether the participant was screened for proteinuria during the first prenatal visit
codebookDescription: If  woman was screened for proteinuria at the first visit then, SYPH02_32_E2_C2=1,  If  woman was not screened for proteinuria at the first visit then, SYPH02_32_E2_C2=2, If  was unknown if woman was screened for proteinuria at the first visit then, SYPH02_32_E2_C2=3

label: 'HIV test performed
definition: Whether the participant was screened for HIV during the first prenatal visit
codebookDescription: If  woman was screened for HIV at the first visit then, SYPH02_30_E2_C2=1, If  woman was not screened for HIV at the first visit then, SYPH02_30_E2_C2=2, If  was unknown if woman was screened for HIV at the first visit then, SYPH02_30_E2_C2=3
